title: Fire Doors And Sprinklers Debut At Garment Factories In Bangladesh
teaser: In April 2013, the Rana Plaza in Bangladesh collapsed, killing over 1,100 workers employed in the garment factories in the building. Now there's an effort to make sure all garment factories are safe.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
